forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing this afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing this afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers overnight. Low around 5C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 41F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High around 10C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High near 50F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a shower or two during the evening, followed by partly cloudy skies late. Low 3C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 58F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 44F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.
